name: My Family Is Trapped
description:
Made for "Godot Wild Jam #24" with the theme - "Family". Wildcards used - "Pet the dog" and "secret passage".

Plot:

You find yourself in a dungeon like place, your family is trapped here somewhere. Crawl rooms, find keys, unlock doors, and try to free as much family members as you can. This is a pretty much puzzle game also.
